properties.description: Use this to report problems with ARM operations.

subcategories.name: Create
subcategories.description: Use this to report problems related to creating a new azure virtual machine such as provisioning or allocation failures.

subcategories.name: Delete
subcategories.description: Use this to report failures in deleting VMs.

subcategories.name: Other
subcategories.description: Use this to report Control Plane operation failures that don't fall into other ARMOperation categories
